about.name: Jiali Qian
about.title: Data Scientist
about.summary: Master's Student in Data Science | Data Analyst
about.description: Data Science graduate student at NYU with experience in machine learning, data analysis, and software development. Proven track record in implementing ML solutions and optimizing data pipelines. Seeking full-time opportunities to leverage my expertise in data science and machine learning.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.empty: No items match your filters. Try adjusting your selection.

items.title: Master's in Data Science at NYU
items.description: Pursuing advanced studies in data science at NYU's Center for Data Science, focusing on machine learning, natural language processing, and big data technologies.
items.summary: Maintaining a 3.85 GPA while working as a research assistant on computer vision projects and collaborating across disciplines.

items.title: Pedestrian Crossing Distance Analysis
items.description: Leading research on urban walkability using computer vision to analyze pedestrian crossing distances in cities across the US.
items.summary: Fine-tuned Meta's SAM2 model for satellite imagery analysis, optimized inference pipelines, and implemented cloud infrastructure.

items.title: MetroScore Transit Analysis
items.description: Developing an open-source Python package for analyzing public transit efficiency compared to car-based transit in urban environments.
items.summary: Created benchmarks for routing algorithm evaluation and optimized transit route search functionality.

items.title: Data Analyst at UC San Diego
items.description: Worked at UC San Diego's Center for Microbiome Innovation, analyzing COVID-19 data and maintaining campus health dashboards.
items.summary: Improved tracking algorithms and modernized infrastructure, enhancing COVID-19 tracing accuracy by 15%.

items.title: B.S. in Data Science at UCSD
items.description: Completed undergraduate studies in Data Science with a minor in Business at the University of California, San Diego.
items.summary: Graduated with a 3.70 GPA, completed a capstone project on machine learning for financial market analysis, and served as a teaching assistant.

items.title: Data Analyst Intern at Logitech
items.description: Internship in Logitech's Go-to-Market department, analyzing product performance and generating sales trend visualizations.
items.summary: Conducted performance analysis on 60+ core products and created visualizations for price adjustments.

items.title: Aerosol Flow Analysis
items.description: Developed a mobile application for evaluating aerosol transmission risks in public spaces using sensor data and computer vision.
items.summary: Built an iOS app using Swift for data collection and implemented real-time risk assessment algorithms.

projects.title: Projects
